page.title: 02BUGTHORPE SCHOOL
page.content: There are 53 children in the school. Twenty two Infants,nineteen lower juniors and twelve upper juniors. The teachers are Mr.Hibbert,who is the Headteacher,Mr.Jones and Mrs.Fletcher. Mrs.Smithson teaches the nursaery every afternoon. Miss Allen and Mrs.Gray are the cooks and Mrs.Metcalfe is the caretaker. The school has afootball pitch a mini tennis court and two games sheds. Only five people from the village come to the school.Thirteen children come by mini bus,nine by Land Rover,eight by taxi ad thirteen by private car.
